channel.title: 2025-09-27 10:30:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2025-09-27 10:30:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 27 Sep 2025 10:30
item.description:
Spent most of this morning building this RC fella. S received this ’lego’ kit as a gift for Christmas last year.

One of those frustrating yet terrific builds. Instructions were okay and the parts were all mixed up. To compensate though, the build quality was terrific - the kind that gives you that satisfying ‘click’ when you connect the pieces. Drives like a champ and the revolving gattling gun is a super neat addition.

ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded:
Spent most of this morning building this RC fella. S received this ’lego’ kit as a gift for Christmas last year.

One of those frustrating yet terrific builds. Instructions were okay and the parts were all mixed up. To compensate though, the build quality was terrific - the kind that gives you that satisfying ‘click’ when you connect the pieces. Drives like a champ and the revolving gattling gun is a super neat addition.
